install.done:
:white_check_mark: Installation complete.
You may want to manage permissions for each installed commands under `Server parameters => Integrations => Bots and apps`
install.intro: Select the commands you'd like to install for this Discord server on the list bellow

roles.label: Roles selector
roles.description: Allow to add a role selector

twitch.label: Twitch live alerts
twitch.description: Allow to un/subscribe to a twitch channel live events

poll.label: Create polls
poll.description: Allow members to create a poll

birthday.label: Birthday alerts
birthday.description: Allow members to set their birthdate to get notified

inactivity.label: Users inactivity
inactivity.description: Configure an inactivity delay after which users' roles are changed

support.label: Support system
support.description: Allow to configure a support system

admin.role_allowed: :white_check_mark: The role <@&{role}> has been allowed to use admin commands
admin.role_disallowed: :x: The role <@&{role}> is not allowed to use admin commands anymore
admin.user_allowed: :white_check_mark: The user <@{user}> has been allowed to use admin commands
admin.user_disallowed: :x: The user <@{user}> is not allowed to use admin commands anymore
admin.birthday_chan_ok: :white_check_mark: Birthday notifications will be sent on this channel
admin.leave_chan_ok: :white_check_mark: A notification will be sent on <#{TARGET}> when someone leaves the server

role_selector.description: Adds a role selector with the specified roles or all if no roles are specified

admin.birthday: Defines this channel as the target for the birthday notifications

inactivity.description: Define a number of days after which a user will be considered inactive
inactivity.days: Number of days after which a user will be considered inactive and her/his roles updates
inactivity.days_warn: Number of inactive days after which a user will receive a warning via DM
inactivity.disable_ok: :white_check_mark: The inactivity delay has been disabled successfully
inactivity.role_add: Role to add when member becomes inactive
inactivity.role_del: Role to remove when member becomes inactive

leave.description: Send a notification when someone leaves the server
leave.param: Channel to send the notifications to

twitch.description: Enable or disable twitch live notifications
twitch.watch: The twitch login of the channel to start watching
twitch.unwatch: The twitch login of the channel to stop watching

birthday.description: Set your birthdate to get notified on this channel

poll.title: Title of the poll
poll.unique: Can user vote for only one option? (only works if anonvotes is true)

target.description: Set the category target for the support channels

cta.description: Send the support ticket creation form

roles.intro: Open the selector bellow and select all the roles you want
roles.add_ok: :white_check_mark: <@{user}>, you now have the selected roles !
roles.del_all_intro: To reset all your roles, click the button bellow
roles.del_all_ok: :white_check_mark: <@{user}>, all your roles have been reset.

twitch.not_configured: :x: This feature is missing some values in the `config.js` file to work. Fill them in and try again
twitch.user_added: :white_check_mark: A notification will be sent on this channel when the Twitch user **{user}** goes live
twitch.user_removed: :white_check_mark: The live notifications for the **{user}** are now disabled
twitch.user_notFound: :x: The Twitch user **{user}** does not exists

birthday.invalid_date: The specified date is invalid. Format must be the following : `{FORMAT}`
birthday.success: :white_check_mark: Your birthday has been set to **{date}**

support.configure_success: :white_check_mark: The target category has been set to #{TARGET}
support.creation_success: :white_check_mark: The private support channel <#{TARGET}> has been created
support.invalid_chan_type: ‚ùå The specified target #{TARGET} is not a category
